mapper.insert: insert into category values ( null, #{name}, #{description}, now(), #{userNo})
mapper.select: select no, name, description, reg_date as regDate, user_no as userNo from category where no = (select last_insert_id());
select a.*, (select count(*) from post where category_no = a.no) as postAmount from category a

select a.no, a.name, a.description, a.reg_date as regDate, a.user_no as userNo, (select count(*) from post where category_no = a.no) as postAmount from category a where user_no = (select no from user where id = #{id});
select min(no) as no from category where user_no = (select no from user where id = #{id})
